sentence.text: The deafness genes GJB3, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, GRHL2, DFNA5, and ATP6B1 were expressed in marmoset cochleae in patterns different from those in mouse cochleae.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The other tested genes, including the deafness gene regulation of cell shape, in which mutation recapitulates deafness in mice, were expressed in a similar manner in both species.
